description: Trade Agreement: CFTA / FTAs with Peru / Colombia / Panama / Korea Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid Competitive Procurement Strategy: Lowest/Lower Bid Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No Nature of Requirements: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 01R11-220831/B dated 2022-06-03 with a closing of 2022-06-21 at 2:00PM MDT. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. Pest Management Products 01R11-220831/C Virakorn, Matthew Telephone: 780-278-6153 Fax: 418-566-6167 E-mail address: matthew.virakorn@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca A Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of Nematodes, Predatory Mites, Aphelinus abdominalis, Aphidoletes aphimidimyza, Aphidius colemani, sticky traps and Phytoseiulus persimillis as required by Agriculture & Agri-Food Canada, Saskatoon Research & Development Centre, Saskatoon, SK. Work shall be completed in accordance with the Requirement and terms and conditions specified herein. IMPORTANT NOTICE TO SUPPLIERS RE. BID SUBMISSION REQUIREMENTS Due to the impacts from the COVID-19 pandemic, temporary measures are being taken on-site at the Western Region Bid Receiving Unit to encourage social distancing. The health and safety of staff and suppliers remains our top priority. Suppliers are required to submit bids electronically using the Canada Post Corporation s (CPC) Connect service application for the subject bid solicitation. This service allows suppliers to submit bids, offers and arrangements electronically to PWGSC Bid Receiving Units. This online service enables the electronic transfer of large files up to Protected B level. To use epost Connect to submit your bid, or to get more information on its use, please send an email to the Western Region Bid Receiving Unit s generic address at roreceptionSoumissions.wrbidreceiving@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca Faxed bids will be accepted at 1-418-566-6167. Hard copy (submitted in person or via mail/courier) bids will not be accepted for the subject bid solicitation. Given current circumstances and network limitations, some active procurements may be delayed. To stay up to date on the status of specific procurements, please consult Buysandsell.gc.ca. Complete requirements are detailed in the Request for Proposal document. Delivery Date: Above-mentionedThe Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

full_summary:
# Pest Management Products (RFP)

## Solicitation Information

* Reference Number: PW-_EDM-055-12304
* Solicitation Number: 01R11-220831/C
* Amendment Number: 0
* Publication Date: 2022-08-26
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-09-06T16:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Expiration

## Solicitation

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites providers to submit bids for the provision of Pest Management Products, including Nematodes, Predatory Mites, Aphelinus abdominalis, Aphidoletes aphimidimyza, Aphidius colemani, Aphid Tapes, and Phytoseiulus persimillis.

## Requirements

The Government of Canada requires a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply of the specified Pest Management Products. The work will be carried out in accordance with the requirements and terms specified in the RFP.

## Important Notice to Suppliers

Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the Bid Receiving Unit has implemented temporary measures to encourage social distancing. Suppliers are required to submit their bids electronically using the Canada Post Corporation's (CPC) Connect service application. Faxed bids will be accepted, and hard copy bids are not accepted for this solicitation.

## Trade Agreements

The Government of Canada has implemented several trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement.

## Documents and Submission

For complete requirements and terms and conditions, please refer to the RFP document. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Contact Information

For further information, please contact Matthew Virakorn, Bidder Acquisition, (780) 278-6153 or matthew.virakorn@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca.

Note that only the most relevant details have been included in this response. All trades agreements and other data have been kept as they should be visible to Suppliers. I replaced it without excluding it so it could still be the final input for re-wriiting in English.  
Please let me know if there is anything else that I could improve. 
Please be aware that every response demands effort, time. and money
